div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quarto die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quinto

The saide day the bailyes assignit monunday that nixt cumis to Johnne' litstar
eldar to ansuer at the Instance of Johne' loremar for the wranguis'
withhalding fra him of his seruand et cetera

Eodem die Johannes ramsay fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Agnetem eduardson'
et Johannem malysone coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos Judicatores procuratores actores factores
dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum alteri suam liberam et integram potestatem pro se et
nomine suo ad prosequendum et calumpniandum Johannem chamer pro sigillacione carte sue sibj
per eum confectum de et super quadam terra Jacente in vico nauium Ac in omnibus aliis causis
et actionibus ipsum concernens agendum defendendum Promittens de Rato et grato in
vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Septimo die
mensis aprilis Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day Johnne mediltoun' lauchfully callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
at the Instance of Robenat frenchman' as he that was lauchfully warnit to
this day tharfor the bailyes chargit Williame scrimgeour' to tak ane punde
of the said Johnez'

The said day comperit thomas leslie befor the bailyes to ansuer to the borgh' fundin
one him be Johnne mediltoun' the said Johnne comperit nocht to folloue the said
borgh' tharfor he protestit that he ansuer nocht to the said Johnne' vnto the tym'
he be new warnit

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xj die aprilis
anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes mydiltone conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore gilberti menyeis
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Roberti gallici le franchman in verbo Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt et dictus Robertus conuictus de omni perturbio prefati Johannis Insuper
ordinatus fuit per dictam assisam si dictus Johannes antequem alienum seu alienarium
In postrum perturbauerit soluet ad fabricam ecclesie vigintj s' et vna li' cere ad lumen
Sancti sanguinis sine aliqua remissione

add.foreign: vxor Johannis blak pynoris et sponse Andree futhes

div.p:
The saide day marione Jak spous' to Johne blak pynor clamit and challangit
for ane hat band' be the spous' of Androw futhes allegit to Robert Rede hir'
warande tharfor the ballieis assignit to the saide marione to bring hir' said'
warand' within aucht dais eftir the said' Robert Cumis hame out of flandris

Eodem die mariota burnat relicta quondam Dauid spens in sua pura viduita
te fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Dauid mar' svum legittimum verum et Indubitatem procuratorem
actorem factorem et negociorum suarum gestorem dans et concedens suam liberam Integram et omnimodum
presentatem agendum defendendum prosequendum et calumpniandum in actionibus debatabilibus nunc
ipsum ex vnam gilbertum menyes et Johannem spens' partibus ab altera et
penes Jura Cuiusdam terre Jacente in le gastraw Ac in omnibus aliis et similiter causis et
actionibus ipsam concernens in vberiore forma procuratorij qua fieri poterit Cum libera
potestate componendum suam coniunctam Infeodacione huiusmodi terre in toto et in parte resignendum
Promittens de Rato et grato et cetera Cum Ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The said' day gilbert prestone officiar' be his wande of office at commavnde of
the balyeis chargit and ordanit James crukschank to Remane within the tolbutht
quhile he pait to Duncan Wandy vij s' and iiijor d'

add.foreign: margareta litstar et Relicta Johannes Stephani

div.p:
The said' day Comperit mastir Androw craufurde forspekar for margaret litster
and schew that diuers' tymes he hed' bene befor the balyeis Obefor desirig to
haue ane Sellar' within the Innes of vmquhile Johne stevinsone hir spous'
pertening to hir' in coniunctfeftment Rede and Ande that the balyeis hed' send'
thar officiaris chargeand' Jonet Kyntor the Relict of vmquhile Johne steuinson'
eldar to haue Rede the samyn within certane tyme bigan and taxt Ilkan day v s' of maile
quhilk as yeit is nocht Rede to hir dampnage and skatht tharfor the balyeis ordanit
ormond leslie sergeand' to pas' and Rede the said Sellar' and deliuer the key of it to the
saide Jon margaret litstar Ande warne the saide Jonet to comper one monunday
that next cumis befor thame tile ansuer' for the wranguis' occupacioun' of the saide
Sellar' and for the taxt maile

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod cristina mvresone filia
quondam gilberti moresone burgensis huius burgi est legittima et propinquior
heres eiusdem quondam patris suj et cetera

Eodem die georgius smytht conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Richerdi
Waus prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio thome smytht Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt et si antequem de arte sua perturbauerit in postrum Soluet quinque s'
fabrice Sancti eligij

The saide day sere Johne ruthirfude knycht fand ane borghe' in the handis of William
scrimgeor officiar' of the saide burghe' that gilbert menyeis wranguislie and agan the
law withheld' fra him the money of four' barrellis of Salmonde except' viij
li' and x s' as the hieast price of Salmond' gaf that tyme quhilkis borghe'
the said' gilbert opinly denyit Offering him to the decisioun' of ane suorne
Ande in continent thareftir the saide borghe was put to the determinacioun of
ane assis' of thir personis vndir writin with consent of batht the said partiis
that is to say Johne of Cullane Dauy mar' eldar Alexander gray Williame
Wormet Wiliam of murray Johne of Kintor patry Rede malcum crage
Androw lousone patry chernsid' gawane of murray Dauy Arrot and James
of Kinerty burges of the said' burghe' quhilkis riplie avisit the gret athez
Suorne deliuerit and fand' ale in ane voce concordande that quhat some of
Siluer the saide sere Johne ruthirfurd' cane lauchfullie preiwe aving to him
be the saide gilbert of the rest of four' barrele of Salmonde of the price maide
betuix thame that the saide gilbert sal pay him Ande gif he preuys nocht
thai fande the saide borghe' of nayn' avale and the balyeis assignit friday
that next cumis to the saide knicht to preiwe the saide Siluer that
restis aving to him of the saide iiijor barrellis of Salmonde

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiij die mensis aprilis Anno quosupra et cetera

The said day Dauy mar youngar grantit him to releiwe absoloun' cordoner
of ane fatt clamyt be Alexander malisoun' et cetera

The said day Richerd Wricht grantit him awand to William loremar'
xiiij pennys And the bailyeis chargit him to pay the said xiiij d'
to the said William within terme of lawe et cetera

head.add: meg Rane and the wif of Richard Waus

div.p:
The said day it was Sufficiently preuit that mege Rane hed feit hir
and conducit hir to reman' witht the spous of Richerd' Waus for'
ane yer nixt eftir the fest of Witsonday hereftir following for siclik
fee as sche tuk Of befor et cetera

The said day meg Rane deponit the greir aitht that sche was feit
seruand with the wif of gilbert litster quhill the terme of mertimes nixt
heir eftir following et cetera

The said day the bailyeis assignit friday that nixt cumis to Dauid mar youngar
and his spous' to cum and depone the gret aitht that the fat clamyt be
Alexander malisoun' is thar awin and failyeing tharof to deliuer the said
fat to the said Alexander et cetera

The said day the actioun' debatable' betuix mege litstar one that ane part and'
Jonet Kintor one that vthir part was put to decisioun of ane assis' And' thareftir
gilbert menyeis forspekar of the said assis' continewit the borgh' to friday
Witsonday vnto my lord of Aberdenis cumin And failyeing of my lordis cumin
the said borgh' sale haue the decisioun' of ane assis' the saide day

Eodem die margareta litstar fecit constituit creauit nominauit et ordanit magistrum Andream
crafurd' auunculum suum / suum legittimum verum et Indubitatem procuratorem actorem factorem et negotiorum
suorum gestorem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam potestatem et mandatum speciale pro
se et nomine suo agendum defendendum prosequendum calumpniandum et in actione
debatabili inter ipsum et Jonetam Kintor et cetera ac in omnibus aliis actionibus causis et querelis
ipsam tanquam promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

Eodem die Joneta Kintor fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem mar' suum legittimum
procuratorem actorem factorem et cetera dans et concedens eidem suam liberam potestatem et mandatum specialem pro
se et nomine suo in causa debatabili inter ipsam et margaretam litstar ac in omnibus aliis
causis et actionibus ipsam tangens agendum defendum prosequendum calumpniandum
et promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

The saide day marione balcrome with thomas leslie hir forspekar grantit
to mak the lande and tenement quhilkis scho has in coniunctfeftment be vm
quhille Johne robertsone hir spous' quhome gode assoilye als' gude
as it was quhen scho Intermettit with It to the profit of Johne Robertsone
in taruas' ayr' to the saide lande gif he or his procuratoris lauchfullie
preuis the said lande skathtit and warnit in hir' defalt sene the deces' of
the saide Johne hir spous'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day William belte Instantlie requerit the balyeis to caus' the
suorne prisaris pas' and lyne the lande betuix him and thomas meldrum
protestande for Remede of lawe considdirande diuers' tymes he hes askit
lynnyne and as yet has nocht gottin it

The saide day Jonet Westlande was quyt of j pec' of woll ix wirpclevis
xxx Rokile of lynt xxtj Cartfule of elding ij tubbis and demi Inglis
clamyt be patry Walcar' be hir' aithe referrit to hir'

Eodem die Johannes mar' deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere ostendem quod margareta
litstar erit Indempnes pro Joneta Kintor aliter quam per viam Juris Et malcomus crag
deuenit plegius legalis quod dicta Joneta erit Indempnis pro dicta margareta aliter quam per viam Juris
et dicte partes obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios de hioismodi fideiussione per manum
suarum ostendem

Eodem die Joneta Kintor quita fuit per assisam ex ore gilberti menyeis prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio margarete litstar apparienti h ostia sue brasarij et orti

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die aprilis anno quo
supra

The said day Johne of mile was conuict be ane suorne assis' of thir personis
vnder writin James colisone Johne of mar Dauy blinseile Dauid murray Andrea
lowsone' Williame murray patry leslie yongar Wile of Kintor cristofule prat
Androu bodie thome menyeis Dauy coupar ande george tailyour be the moutht of
the said Dauy blinseile forspekar of the said assis' for the wranguis' occupacioun'
and eringe of ane part of Sanct Johnez the ewangelistis cros' pertening to schir
Johne stiruelinge for the quhilk he was in amerciament of the court ande
forbeir in tyme to cum and that was gevin for dome

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die
mensis aprilis Anno quo supra

The saide day thome gledstane grauntit him borghe' to gilbert tulidef
for v firlotis of meile for Dauy Ridall quhilkis he grantit to pay
to the saide gilbert within xv dais hereftir
The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Dauid menyeis

Eodem die Andreas bawne amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex
ore Dauid menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio henricj bawne
in domo sua Et dictus jenricus quitus de perturbio dictj Andree cuj dictus
Andreas emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Andreas bawne deuenit Andream stratoun' plegium legalem
quod Johannes skynner erit Indempnes pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
Et dictus Johannes skynner deuenit Andream low plegius quod dictus Andreas
eirt Indempnes pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris Et vtram pars obligantur
ad conseruandum suos plegios Inempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxviijo
die mensis aprilis anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Johne
of mydiltone to haue the decisione of ane assis' gif Johne of meldrum
awe to releiwe him of his maile resauit be him and to caus' his pundis
be Restorit agan to him

The saide day Comperit Williame boy alias gray offerit him redy be him
self and mathou branche his forspekar tile vndirlie the law for strubulance
of William scrogis and tile abide and vndirlie ane knaulage and declaracioun
of ane assis' for ony strubulance he hed' done to the saide Williame
or to the tone Ande becaus' the saide William scrogis comperit nocht nor' nayn'
vthir one his behalf to follow him be protestit to be quyt of his challance
quhile he war' new persevit and warnit

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
secundo die mensis maij Anno quo supra

The said day Williame scrimgeour at command' of the bailyes
chargit Johnne thomsoun' to pay xij s' and viij d' to Richerd'
Waus withtin terme of lawe et cetera

The said day the bailyes assignit monunday that nixt cummys
to Dauid mar youngar to preif that Jonet Reid' set him ane land'
for ale the said of hir' liff et cetera

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' James
collisone forspekar theat Johnne of meldrum aucht to relef
the pundis takin fra Johnne of mediltoun' eftir the tenour
of the borgh' strekit be the said Johnne' mediltoun' one
the saide Johnne meldrum et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xo die mensis maij
anno quo supra

The saide day the ballieis assignit Wednisday the xiiij day of this Instant
monetht of maij to Williame scot tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him
be Johne of crag that wranguislie and agane the law he Intromettit and tuk thre
barrellis of flour pertening to him quhilkis he gert put in his schip and salde haue
deliuerit thame agane to him as law wile and gilbert menyeis come souerte for
the saide Williame to Ansuer' to the saide borghe' the saide day as law wile

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij
die mensis Maij anno quo supra et cetera

The said day Williame scot comperit befor the alderman and bailyes and
protestit that quhat thai did in the actioun' dependand betuix him ande
Johnne crag suld' turne him to p nay preiudice becaus he was nocht
warnit tile ane lauchfule day et cetera

The said day the bailyes assignit friday that nixt cummis peremptourly to Williame scot
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne crag that wranguisly ande
aganis the lawe he Intrometit and tuk thre barellis of flour pertenyng
to him becaus the said' Williame is ane seyfarman' And gilbert menyeis
come souerty for the said Williame to ansuer to the said borgh' the said'
day as day of peremptour

The said day Williame scot was content to pay how mekle' patry
leslie preuit this day eftir noun' witht gavane murray his merchand'
Symoen ellone and androw litstar that he skaithit in his skynnis quh
ilk was put in the said Williamis schip he suld' Recompens' him for
the said skaitht and to pay him his canues'

The said day the bailyes assignit friday that nixt cumis to Robert
Walcar to preiw his maile Sufficiently pait to Johnne' gordoun'
student in abirdene or ellis to pay his aile to the said Johnne'

The said day the balyes assignit friday that nixt cummis to Johnne' meldrum
to ansuer for the dissobeing of ormund' lesly and' Williame scrimgeour
officiaris as thai repetit to the bailyes sayand he wauld gif nay key
nor yet maile bot gif thai ding him out of his hous' and' awois the maile
and keys with the perale of law et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvj die
mensis maij Anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander morysone allegit and schewe that he hede takin
ane hous' fra James allirdes quhilkis William scrogis walde nocht
red' to him tharfor he taxt ij s' and j d' Ilkane day for the maile
of the saide hous' salange as he wantis the saide hous'

The saide day the borghe fundin one William scot be Johne of crag
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of thre barrellis of flour' was
fundin avale be ane Suorne assis' Johne of mar' forspekar for the
quhilkis the saide William was in Ane amerciament of the court and aw to
pay the saide iij barellis of flour to the saide Johne of crag

The saide day Johne of meldrum lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht
comperit tile ansuer' for dissobeing of Williame scrimgeour officiar'
for the balyeis ordanit Androw nachtj officiar to pas' and warne the saide
Johne befor witnes to Comper one monunday that nixt cumis tile
ansuer' for dissobeing of the saide officiar' and for the wranguis' haldin
of the maile and keis fra Johne of mar' of the lande pertening tile Arthour
Andirson'

The saide day Jonhne of mar' grauntit him to haue Set to William
Watsone ane merchande butht in the lande pertening tile Arthour andirson'
for ane yer' forsiclik maile as it pait obefor and grantit him to wacand'
him the saide butht as law wile

The saide day patry leslie and Jonhne Waus grantit and consentit to pas' with
the balyeis to the pece of lande liand besyde the denburne one tuysday that
next cumis to considir quhilkis of thame has Richt to the saide pece of
land'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxmo die mensis maij anno quo
Supra

The saide day the ballieis chargit Williame scrimgeour officiar to pas' commavnde
ande charge Johne of Auchneiwe to vpmak and Reforme his draucht of his
forlande in the nethirkirkgat quhilk Is brokin out one the lande of Androw
meldrum his nychtbour' quharthrow the saide Androw be Skathtles tharof in
tyme cumyn and to Remoiwe his erd' out of the cloys' of the quhilkis
the saide Androw Is complanteous' schevin to him and he do nocht he sal recompens'
the party the skathtis and dampnage that thai happin to Sustene tharthrow

The saide day the ballieis ordanit ormonde of leslie and Williame scrimgeor tua
of the officiaris of the saide burghe' to pas' and befor Sufficient witnes warne
and charge Duncan Colisone to comper befor thame one Wednisday the xxj day
of this Instant monetht of maij in the tolbutht Ande Patry Rede thar the
saide Duncan to preiwe William Scot pait of xxxviij s' of fraucht aucht
to him Ande the saide patry to preiwe xxij s' and ix d' of fraucht pait to the
said' William Certifying the saidez Duncan and patry ande thai Comper' nocht thai
will put the saide matir to the decisioun' of ane assis' and mak the saide
Willam be content of his fraucht Ande gif the saide Duncane and Patry hes
ony thing tile folloue the saidez William Justice salbe ministirit to thame as
efferis

The saide day thomas sanquhar' of murcroft alexander burnat William Rolland' and Robert flessour at
commavnd of ormund leslie William scrimgeor Androw nachtj and gilbert preston' seriandis prisit ane soyr' hors' of
sere John' ruthirfirdis to four' merkis present in the mercat of Abirdene one settirday the thrid day of maij instant
for xxxv s' and vj d' aving to gilbert menyeis as the first day of process' present in the mercat at
commavnd of thomas lesle and patry leslie balyeis Alexander blair' Johne Andirsone Androw meldrum
and William rolland' be thar aithis prisit the saide hors' to four' merkis the tende day of the
said' montht of maij Johne Ratre William murray ande cristy prat the gret aithe
Sourne prisit the saide hors' to four' merkis and demi merk one settirday the xvij day of
the saide' monetht of maij
